meanings.definition: A method of folding paper in a zigzag pattern.
meanings.sent1: The fanfolding of the paper created a unique design.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated the fanfolding technique to her friends.
meanings.sent3: The fanfolding of the paper made it look like a tiny accordion.
meanings.sent4: The fanfolding of the map revealed hidden details.
meanings.sent5: The precision of his fanfolding was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: The act of folding paper in a fan-like manner.
meanings.sent1: Her fanfolding of the origami crane was flawless.
meanings.sent2: The fanfolding of the napkin added an elegant touch to the table setting.
meanings.sent3: The fanfolding of the paper reminded him of a peacock's tail.
meanings.sent4: The fanfolding of the brochure caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The intricate fanfolding technique required patience and skill.
